name: Monster Truck 4x4 Derby
description:
Features Of Game:
* Realistic Monster Truck Destruction With Smooth Controls
* Different Fearless Army Monsters Truck with Upgrades Power of Demolition
* Large Number Of Fighting Arenas, Island Driving and Desert Offroad Drift Environment
* Stunning 3D Stunts and Realistic Monster Effects On Mud
* Crashing, Smashing, Demolish And Destruction Of 4x4 Army Jeeps and Heavy Mud Trucks
* Challenging and engaged game idea full of addiction
* Earn Coins and Unlock Heavy Monster trucks
